Adult (Black-necked).description: Black-necked Stilts are shorter with a more dainty appearance than American Avocets. They also have a shorter and straighter bill than the longer and upturned bill on American Avocets.

Breeding adult.description: Marbled Godwits are browner overall than American Avocets with a heavily barred back and belly (during the breeding season). Their bill is also bi-colored but the bill on American Avocets is solid black .
